page.title: 17COMPUTER GAMES.
page.content: My pastime is playing on my Sinclair Zx Spectrum 48k computer.I play about 5 hours aday sometimes.I play Jet Set Willy which involves a man called Wil- ly who has to go round a house and collect 100 items before 12.00 pm or Martha kills you.I have some codes wh- ich can get rid of all monsters,infin- ate lives,fall as far as he wants,rem- ove star on main landing,walk backwar- ds on escalators,jump as far as he wa- nts.Sometimes I play Football Manager .You have to manage a team and get it into the 1st Division.Here are some of my games Sabre Wulf,3D Star wars,Alch- emist,The Hobbit,Manic Miner,Hunchbac- k,Tranz am,Harrier Attack,Alcatraz Ha- rry,Vagas Jackpot,Rifle Range,Chiller, Ghosts Revenge,Scuba Dive,Horace Goes Skiing,Make A Chip,Chess,Chequred Fla- g,Booty,Scrabble,Survival.My favorite is Sabre Wulf.A.TARN AGE 11.
